text: Bananas is a 1971 American comedy movie directed by Woody Allen (who also stars) and starring Louise Lasser, Carlos Montalban, Natividad Abascal, Allen Garfield, Sylvester Stallone, René Enríquez, Miguel Ángel Suárez. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1971 comedy movies Category:1971 LGBT movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies about dictators Category:Movies about terrorism Category:Movies set in South America Category:Movies set in a fictional country Category:Movies directed by Woody Allen Category:Movies composed by Marvin Hamlisch
title: Bananas (movie)
